item.title: Slack Best Practices
item.description: Posts Staying organized using Slack Post feature (Hidden behind the lightning bolt symbol) Create Index, ToDos, Future Log, Daily Log Index Post Label,Category,Tag,Date Post-Id **Future Log ** Future Log 2021 Slack Best Practice 2021-03-23 April 2021 202103W1, 202103W2, 202103W3, 202103W4 Future Log Future Log 2021 Month (eg April 2021) Month (eg May 2021) … … Month (eg June 2021) Month (eg July 2021) … … Month (eg August 2021) Month (eg Sept 2021) … … 202103W1 April Week 1 April 1 April Fools Day 202103W2 April Week 2 April 8 Team meeting Emjoi 👀 (:eyes:) I’m looking into it ✅ (:white_check_mark:) Complete or approved 🙏 (:pray:) Please or thank you 🙇 (:woman-bowing:) Thank you ➕ (:heavy_plus_sign:) I agree 👌 (:ok_hand:) OK!
